title: Bolt

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Set up a sentry at a player's house.
- Fire your hidden gun at a player during the day. (1 day cooldown)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Sentries will attack one person who visits the player each night.
- Sentries grant Invincible defense to the target against the first attack that they receive.
- Sentries last until they take an attack.
- Sentries can attack astral visitors, however only if there are no direct visitors.
- Sentries destroy the wills of everyone that they kill.
- The hidden gun bypasses your sentries.
- Everyone who visits you will be silently roleblocked beyond immunity the next night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 3954
*I have the entire military of a god damn empire under my thumb. May as well have some fun while I'm off, hm?*
